query: SELECT g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email FROM gestores g JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id WHERE u.name LIKE '%Marco%' OR u.name LIKE '%Amorim%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email FROM gestores g JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id WHERE u.name LIKE '%Marco%' OR u.name LIKE '%Amorim%';
